1.title: Fireworks
1.plot: Bing thinks he is brave enough to watch fireworks outside in the garden.

2.title: Bye Bye
2.plot: If you break a special thing you can put it in the Bye Bye Box and keep it safe, so you don't ever forget.

3.title: Swing
3.plot: Even if it's your turn, you mustn't run in front of a swing.

4.title: Blocks
4.plot: Bing is busy with his blocks, building a tower as tall as he is. Coco arrives and upsets Bing when she hijacks the blocks, making a rainbow pattern with them instead. When even Charlie wants to play with the blocks, it's clear a new game needs to be found that they can all play together.

5.title: Ducks
5.plot: Bing and Sula go to the park to feed the ducks. Sula is very good at standing quietly and giving the ducks just the right amount of food. Bing throws all his duck food in the water in one go and gets more than he bargained for when a big flappy goose comes to gobble it all up.

6.title: Smoothie
6.plot: It's snack time for Bing but the only banana left is too mushy to eat. Flop suggests making a smoothie with it instead, but disaster strikes when Bing's carrot accidentally ends up in the blender as well. Bing is upset to discover that once it's been shredded, his carrot has changed and he can't have it back.

7.title: Frog
7.plot: Bing and Sula find a frog in the garden. They want to keep it so decide to make the frog a 'house' in a bucket. When froggy doesn't like her new home and hops out, Flop helps them understand they've not thought enough about what froggy really needs in her home.

8.title: Car Park
8.plot: Bing wants to play his car park game with Flop, but Charlie is visiting and keeps messing up the game. Bing wants Charlie to go away so Flop takes Charlie to play in the kitchen. However, Bing doesn't enjoy his game on his own and finds out that some games are better played together.

9.title: Shadow
9.plot: Your shadow stays with you wherever you are, but if the light can't see you then your shadow can't come out to play.

10.title: Musical Statues
10.plot: It's Bing's turn to choose the game - Musical Statues! Flop gets the music going and soon all the children are dancing like crazy. Much to Bing's distress, Pando wins. Since Bing chose the game, he thought he should win it too. Fortunately, Charlie never stopped dancing and his giggly jiggling gets Bing back on his feet.

11.title: Voo Voo
11.plot: Bing has a mishap which he helps to clear up with the help of Voo Voo the vacuum cleaner.

12.title: Here I Go
12.plot: Bing finds the new slide at the playground too scary for him to go down.

13.title: Growing
13.plot: After having his height measured incorrectly, Bing gets scared that he's growing down.

14.title: Atchoo!
14.plot: Bing feels sneezy and hot so Flop decides that he needs to stay at home.

15.title: Hide and Seek
15.plot: Bing regrets not going to the toilet before the game of hide and seek gets started.

16.title: Bake
16.plot: Bing and Flop are making ginger bunny biscuits for Charlie and Coco.

17.title: Train
17.plot: Bing and Pando experiment with Bing's toy train on the Fun Fort in the playground.

18.title: Say Goodbye
18.plot: Bing and Sula are having so much fun playing together they don't want to say goodbye.

19.title: Lost
19.plot: Bing loses Hoppity Voosh in the park and needs Amma's help to find him again.

20.title: Picnic
20.plot: After several false starts to get out on a picnic Bing and Flop are finally ready to leave - when it starts to rain. Bing is very disappointed but as they unpack the wheelie bag he realises they can have their picnic indoors instead.

21.title: Balloon
21.plot: Bing and Sula invent a noisy game with a helium balloon they find stuck in a tree.

22.title: Dressing Up
22.plot: Coco and Bing both need a crown to complete their outfits, but there is only one.

23.title: Something for Sula
23.plot: Bing makes Sula a picture with all her favourite things on it.

24.title: Knack
24.plot: Bing is frustrated when all his own knacks are easy for everyone else to do too.

25.title: Hearts
25.plot: Sula and Bing tag their favourite things around the house with heart-shaped stickies.

26.title: Storytime
26.plot: Bing's favourite book falls in the bath when he joins in with the story too energetically.

27.title: Giving
27.plot: Bing enjoys choosing the perfect present for Sula, but then wants to keep it for himself.

28.title: Hula Hoop
28.plot: Bing tries Coco's hula hoop and finds out that it's harder than it looks.

29.title: Big Boots
29.plot: Bing and Sula play at being giants and splashing in puddles with their big boots.

30.title: Bubbles
30.plot: Bing and Pando learn to blow bubbles. Pando soon gets the hang of it, but Bing struggles.

31.title: Paddling Pool
31.plot: Bing and Sula find that there is no water in the paddling pool and invent new pool games.

32.title: Blankie
32.plot: Bing inadvertently pees on his blankie. Fortunately his toy has a cape just as soft.

33.title: Boo
33.plot: Coco show Bing how to do really good big boos, and together they make Flop jump.

34.title: Talkie Taxi
34.plot: Bing and Sula discover a new toy at Amma's crèche - a talking ride-on car.

35.title: Kite
35.plot: It's a windy day and Bing wants to fly his Hoppity Voosh kite with Flop.

36.title: More
36.plot: At bathtime Bing just can't help adding a few more squirts of bubble goo - until he gets more bubbles than he can handle.

37.title: Sparkle Magic
37.plot: Bing goes to play with Sula, who is engrossed in a game of sparkle magic when he arrives. Bing wants to play too, but Sula won't let him.

38.title: Tree
38.plot: Bing wants to dig the biggest hole and gets upset when Pando accidentally fills it in. It takes Flop to show them how they can work together.

39.title: Where's Flop?
39.plot: Flop pops to the shop to get some carrots for lunch. Bing stays behind but it's not long before he starts to miss Flop.

40.title: Lunchbox
40.plot: Bing's brand new Hoppity Voosh lunchbox is the same as Pando's. At first it's fun to match, but things turn sour when they get their lunchboxes mixed up.

41.title: Sleepover
41.plot: Coco is staying at Bing's house for her first sleepover.

42.title: Surprise Machine
42.plot: Bing and Sula have a coin each for the surprise machine in Padget's shop.

43.title: Dizzy
43.plot: Bing learns that a little dizzy is fun, but too much dizzy is no fun at all.

44.title: House
44.plot: Coco decides that Bing's house made of sofa cushions is perfect for a game of Big Bad Wolf.

45.title: Ice Lolly
45.plot: Before Bing and Flop can eat their ice lollies, a frog hops into Bing's paddling pool.

46.title: Mural
46.plot: Bing and Sula are painting a mural at Amma's crèche - until Bing's enthusiastic rainbow painting makes paint run all over Sula's tree. Sula is upset, until Flop and Amma help them see that the painting isn't spoiled, it's just different.

47.title: Hiding
47.plot: Bing and Flop play hide and seek on the way to Padget's shop. Bing doesn't want the game to end when they arrive - so he hides behind the store room door where Flop really can't see him. When the door slams shut, Bing is stuck inside.

48.title: Sandcastle
48.plot: Bing and Flop are building a sandcastle when Pando joins them with his digger toy. Bing finds a lovely 'poiky thing' to decorate the top of his castle - not realizing it belongs to Pando's digger.

49.title: Acorns
49.plot: Bing and Sula are in the park with Flop, collecting acorns. When Bing's pile keeps getting smaller Flop suggests they hide behind a bush to see what's happening to them.

50.title: Jingly Shoes
50.plot: Bing finds his old baby shoes, but they're much too small for him now. When they're a perfect fit for baby Charlie, Bing has a hard time letting them go to a new home.

51.title: Looking After Flop
51.plot: Flop is feeling poorly so Bing decides to look after him. However when Bing tries to make Flop a honey-lemon drink, he ends up making a big mess instead.

52.title: Music
52.plot: It's music time at the crèche and everyone wants a turn on the drum. Bing gets impatient waiting for his turn but as he tries to grab the drum from Sula he trips and breaks it.

53.title: Hippoty Hoppity Voosh
53.plot: Bing and Sula are playing with their favourite toys, Hoppity Voosh and Fairy Hippo. When Sula's Hippo gets stuck in a tree Bing throws Hoppity up to the rescue, only for Hoppity to get stuck too.

54.title: Dragon Breath
54.plot: Bing and Pando are playing outside in the cold, making steamy dragon breath. When Flop makes hot chocolate to warm everybody up, Bing doesn't wait for it to cool down enough before putting his fingers in to check how hot it is.

55.title: Come on Charlie
55.plot: Charlie is coming to play and Bing has planned lots of things for them to do. But when Charlie doesn't want to play any of Bing's games, Bing is upset until Flop suggests they watch to see what Charlie really wants to do.

56.title: Skateboard
56.plot: Bing and Flop are at the park when they see Pando on a skateboard. After watching Pando skate up and down Bing can't wait to have a go himself - but it's much harder to balance than Pando makes it look.

57.title: Butterfly
57.plot: Bing is at Amma's crèche when a butterfly flies in and lands on Sula's painting. Bing tries to help the butterfly go back outside by picking it up - but he holds on too tightly to the poor butterfly.

58.title: Chalk Dinosaur
58.plot: Bing draws a stripy, dotty chalk dinosaur on the pavement but just as he's finished a rain shower washes his picture away. Bing is devastated until he sees that a bit of dinosaur is left behind - the start of a new drawing.

59.title: Potato
59.plot: Bing and Sula find Nosey the potato in Amma's vegetable patch. When Nosey goes down the slide too fast and breaks, Amma shows them how to plant both bits of potato so that they can grow new potatoes.

60.title: Wellies
60.plot: When Bing discovers a hole in his favourite yellow wellies, he doesn't want to throw them away in the stinky dustbin. With Flop's help, Bing finds a way to recycle his wellies into colourful flower pots instead.

61.title: Ice Cream
61.plot: When Bing and Flop hear Gilly's ice cream van, they race across the park to find her. Bing finally gets a yummy carroty ice cream, but as he waves goodbye to Gilly it falls on the ground. It's too late to call Gilly back again, so Flop makes Bing a fruit cone out of the remaining cone and some of his fruit kebab instead.

62.title: Plasters
62.plot: When Coco gets a plaster for a paper cut on her finger, Bing wants one too. He makes one out of sticky tape, but it's so sticky that it hurts when he tries to take it off. Bing doesn't want Flop to help so Flop comes up with a new game so that Bing can do it himself.

63.title: Cat
63.plot: On the way to Padget's shop Bing and Flop meet Arlo the cat. Bing loves Arlo and knows just where he likes to be stroked and what games he likes playing. On the way home, Bing spots a new cat to play with - but this one isn't so friendly, at least at first.

64.title: Dandelion
64.plot: Bing and Flop find dandelions in the park. Bing has fun blowing the seeds off lots of them, and decides to take the last one as a present to Sula. Bing has to keep the dandelion safe whilst crossing the whole of the big windy park, only for Sula to scatter the seeds accidentally as she hugs Bing hello.

65.title: Voosh
65.plot: Bing is vooshing with Hoppity in the garden, making him fly higher and higher - until with one big throw Hoppity disappears. Bing eventually finds Hoppity in the washing-up bowl, all wet and mucky. Bing is upset until Flop helps him to give Hoppity a bath in the sink.

66.title: Nature Explorer
66.plot: Bing and his friends play Nature Explorers in Amma's garden, spinning a big colour wheel and finding something in the garden that matches each colour. When it's Bing's turn to find something red, he doesn't look carefully before he tries to pick a raspberry and pricks his finger.

67.title: Choosing
67.plot: Bing has enough money to buy one thing in Padget's shop, but finds it hard to choose between all the exciting toys. He eventually chooses the camper van toy, but on the way home with Flop he begins to regret his decision.

68.title: Dark
68.plot: It's Bing's bedtime, but where's Hoppity? Bing remembers playing with him in the garden earlier in the day, but now it's dark outside. Bing doesn't really like the dark, but Flop finds Bing his carrot torch and together they set off into the dark garden on an adventure to find Hoppity.

69.title: Stuck
69.plot: Bing and Sula are having a lovely time in the park, clambering around on trees. At first it's Sula who needs Bing's help to climb up, but when Bing climbs a bit too high, he gets stuck! Now Bing needs some help himself to get back down.

70.title: Cake
70.plot: Bing's friends are coming to his house for a cake party. When Sula arrives first, Bing can't wait to show her the cake he's made, but in doing so he accidentally tips the cake off its stand.

71.title: Not Yours
71.plot: Bing is helping Flop do the shopping at Padget's shop, but whilst Flop is paying Bing finds a strawberry lolly that he can't resist putting in his pocket.

72.title: Mine
72.plot: After a long day at the seaside, Bing and Pando both want to play one last game of hide and seek before bedtime. Pando finds a great hiding place under the covers of Bing's bed, but by the time Bing finds him, he's fast asleep.

73.title: Lunch
73.plot: Bing and Sula are helping Amma to get lunch ready. Bing helps prepare yummy carrots and peas and pasta, but when lunch is served they're all mixed together and Bing doesn't like it.

74.title: Woof!
74.plot: Bing and Flop find a lost dog in the park. After Flop shows Bing how to make friends, Bing falls in love and decides he wants to keep her. When the dog's owner turns up, Bing finds it hard to say goodbye to his new friend.

75.title: Eggy Head
75.plot: Everyone's making eggy heads at Amma's crèche, using egg shells and cress seeds. Bing knows he has to wait for his Eggy to grow hair, but he tries to speed things up all the same.

76.title: Toy Party
76.plot: Bing gets jealous when Sula pays more attention to Pando on a playdate. As he feels more and more left out, Bing tries to get Sula's attention.

77.title: Mobile Phone
77.plot: Bing is playing the talking lettuce game on Flop's phone when he drops and accidentally breaks it. Too panicked to tell Flop what he's done, Bing puts the phone in the bin - but he's so upset that Flop knows something has happened.

78.title: Show
78.plot: Bing and his friends put on a show in the park. Everyone is excited to see Bing's finale, but when he gets up on the stage Bing is overcome with stage fright, and needs his friends to help him recover.

imdb.title: Bing
plot: Celebrating the noisy, joyful, messy reality of pre-school life.::Lucy Murphy
